name: Python for Beginner
description: This Python course will introduce fundamental programming concepts such as loops, variables, conditions, data structures including OOP (Object Oriented Programming), databases, GUI application projects and many more.
benifits: Computer Programming, Python Programming, Statistical Programming, Data Management, SQL, Databases, Extract, Transform, Load, Computer Networking, Network Model, Other Programming Languages, Computational Logic, Computer Programming Tools, Data Structures, Javascript, Natural Language Processing, Programming Principles, Software Architecture, Software Engineering, Theoretical Computer Science, Web Development
preRequisites: A computer with a stable internet connection. Need basic knowledge of using computer

name: C++ Programming
description: Beginner to Programmer â€” Learn to Code in C & C++. Gain a deep understanding of computer programming by learning to code, debug, and solve complex problems with C and C++. You will cover the basics of programming in C and move on to the more advanced C++ semantics and syntax.
benifits: C Programming Language Family, Computer Programming, C++ Programming, Computer Science, Data Structures, Theoretical Computer Science, Graph Theory, Mathematics, Other Programming Languages, Programming Principles
preRequisites: A computer with a stable internet connection. Need basic knowledge of using computer and good understanding of basic Math.

name: Learn Flutter
description: Learn how to create fast and stunning mobile applications using Flutter, a new mobile framework by google. In this course you will quickly learn how to build an application in Flutter with no previous experience. It is HIGHLY recommended you understand the Dart programming language, see my Dart programming tutorials.
benifits: Mobile Development, Network Security, Web Development
preRequisites: A computer with a stable internet connection. Need basic knowledge of using computer. Basic syntax of Dart Programming language. Basics of programming.

name: C# for Unity
description: Unity games using C#. The first course assumes no programming experience, and throughout the 5 courses in the specialization you'll learn how to program in C# and how to use that C# knowledge to program Unity games.
benifits: Computer Programming, Other Programming Languages, C Programming Language Family, Software Engineering, Software Engineering Tools, Computer Graphics, Entrepreneurship, Interactive Design, Leadership and Management, Problem Solving, Research and Design, Applied Mathematics, FinTech, Finance, Linear Algebra, Mathematics, Programming Principles, Visual Design
preRequisites: A computer with a stable internet connection. Need basic knowledge of using computer

name: Node.js
description: This course is the perfect that will take you from a complete beginner to an advanced, highly-skilled Node.js developer. By building this huge project, you will learn all the skills that you need in order to plan, build, and deploy your own modern back-end applications with Node.js and related technologies.
benifits: Back-End Web Development, Computer Architecture, Databases, Distributed Computing Architecture, NoSQL, Web Development, Javascript
preRequisites: A computer with a stable internet connection. Need basic knowledge of using computer. Must know javascript, basics of programming in JavaScript, ES6 syntax and modules.

name: Programming in Go
description: You'll understand the basic syntax and control structures of the language by applying Go's concurrency model to build massively parallel systems.You'll learn organize code through the use of packages. Use the Go runtime to build and compile projects.
benifits: Other Programming Languages, Computational Thinking, Computer Programming, Theoretical Computer Science, Operating Systems, Software Architecture, Software Engineering, Software Testing, Systems Design
preRequisites: A computer with a stable internet connection. Need basic knowledge of using computer
